description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with extensive experience in both academics and industry. With a background in cognitive science and a career spanning various high-impact roles, Yeehaa brings a unique blend of creativity and analytical skills to any team. Accomplished in innovation, project leadership, and user-centered design, Yeehaa is driven by a passion for creating impactful solutions. Authored 'What Is Ecosystem Architecture?' exploring decentralized, vibrant ecosystems and curated no courses.
blurb: Ecosystem architecture draws from philosophy, coding, and the arts to create decentralized, vibrant ecosystems. Positioned between decentralization and regenerative design, it fosters renewal and growth.
